verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4003>fifteenth<s%> <S%G2094>year<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2231>reign<s%> of <S%G5086>Tiberius<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> being <S%G2230>governor<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> being <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G2484>Ituraea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G5139>Trachonitis,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3078>Lysanias<s%> the <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G9>Abilene,<s%>

Annas <S%G452><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2533>Caiaphas<s%> being the high <S%G1909>priests,<s%> <S%G749><s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%> <S%G2197>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> country <S%G4066>about<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins;<s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2090>Prepare<s%> ye <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight.<s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5327>valley<s%> shall be <S%G4137>filled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1015>hill<s%> shall be brought <S%G5013>low;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4646>crooked<s%> shall be <S%G2071>made<s%> <S%G2117>straight,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> rough <S%G5138>ways<s%> shall <S%G1519>be<s%> <S%G3598><s%> made <S%G3006>smooth;<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4992>salvation<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> that came <S%G1607>forth<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> O <S%G1081>generation<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> hath <S%G5263>warned<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> to <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G3195>come?<s%>

Bring <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2590>fruits<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> to our <S%G3962>father:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> to raise <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> unto <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G513>axe<s%> is <S%G2749>laid<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4491>root<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1186>trees:<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> which bringeth not <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> is hewn <S%G1581>down,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4442>fire.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%>

He <S%G1161><s%> <S%G611>answereth<s%> and <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>coats,<s%> let him <S%G3330>impart<s%> to him that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3361>none;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1033>meat,<s%> let him <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3668>likewise.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G4238>Exact<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> that which is <S%G1299>appointed<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G4754>soldiers<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> <S%G1905>demanded<s%> of <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G4160>do?<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> Do <S%G1286>violence<s%> to no <S%G3367>man,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> accuse any <S%G4811>falsely;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G714>content<s%> with <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3800>wages.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> were in <S%G4328>expectation,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>men<s%> <S%G1260>mused<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> whether he were the Christ, or <S%G3379>not;<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1498><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5547><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto them <S%G537>all,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G5204>water;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> one <S%G2478>mightier<s%> than <S%G3450>I<s%> <S%G2064>cometh,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2438>latchet<s%> of <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>unloose:<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> shall <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> with fire: <S%G4442><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G4425>fan<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he will thoroughly <S%G1245>purge<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G257>floor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4621>wheat<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G596>garner;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G892>chaff<s%> he will <S%G2618>burn<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G762>unquenchable.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G2087>things<s%> in his <S%G3870>exhortation<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> he unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5076>tetrarch,<s%> being <S%G1651>reproved<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip's<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4190>evils<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had <S%G4160>done,<s%>
Added <S%G4369><s%> <S%G2532>yet<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1909>above<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>that<s%> he shut <S%G2623>up<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5438>prison.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G907>baptized,<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> being <S%G907>baptized,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>praying,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> in a <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1491>shape<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> which <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son;<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> I am well <S%G2106>pleased.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2258>be<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> thirty years of <S%G5144>age<s%> <S%G2094><s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G5613>(as<s%> was <S%G3543>supposed)<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2242>Heli,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3158>Matthat,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3017>Levi,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3197>Melchi,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2388>Janna,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3161>Mattathias,<s%> which was the son of <S%G301>Amos,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3486>Naum,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2069>Esli,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3477>Nagge,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3092>Maath,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3161>Mattathias,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4584>Semei,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2490>Joanna,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4488>Rhesa,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2216>Zorobabel,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4528>Shealtiel,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3518>Neri,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3197>Melchi,<s%> which was the son of <S%G78>Addi,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2973>Cosam,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1678>Elmodam,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2262>Er,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2499>Jose,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1663>Eliezer,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2497>Jorim,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3158>Matthat,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3017>Levi,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G4826>Simeon,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2494>Jonan,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1662>Eliakim,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3190>Melea,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3104>Menan,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3160>Mattatha,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3481>Nathan,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1138>David,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> which was the son of <S%G5601>Obed,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1003>Boaz,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4533>Salmon,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3476>Naasson,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G284>Aminadab,<s%> which was the son of <S%G689>Aram,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2074>Esrom,<s%> which was the son of <S%G5329>Phares,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> which was the son of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2291>Terah,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3493>Nahor,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G4562>Serug,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4466>Reu,<s%> which was the son of <S%G5317>Phalec,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1443>Heber,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4527>Sala,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2536>Cainan,<s%> which was the son of <S%G742>Arphaxad,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4590>Shem,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3575>Noah,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2984>Lamech,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3103>Methuselah,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1802>Enoch,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2391>Jared,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3121>Maleleel,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2536>Cainan,<s%>
Which was the son of <S%G1800>Enos,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4589>Seth,<s%> which was the son of <S%G76>Adam,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
